entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries later in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023
